itemDatabase.name: Melee Stance Activation
description: When switching to this stance Critical strike rate is increased by <color=#D76E20>{0}</color>% and lifesteal is increased by <color=#D76E20>{1}</color>%. Additionally, attack damage is increased by <color=#D76E20>{2}</color>% for {duration}s.
This buff can be stackable with other stance buffs.
This effect can only occur once every {cooldown}s.
